resources.string:
v2.0.2-6
 First production release of Cadpage 2.0
 
 In notification Settings, the somewhat confusing "Reassert volume control" setting as been reversed and is now "Override volume control".
 
 A new "Override do not disturb status" setting allows you to override the do not disturb status.
 
 Location Fixes:
 Suffolk County, NY
 
 v2.0.2-5
 Location Fixes:
 Tolland County, CT
 Kent County, DE
 Lehigh County, PA
 Vigo County, IN
 
 v2.0.2-4
 Location Fixes:
 Marion County, IN
 MICOM, NJ
 
 General Fixes:
 Fixed number of odd problems when you exit and then re-enter Cadpage.
 
 v2.0.2-3
 Fixed problem opening calls from call history.
 
 v2.0.2-2
 Location Fixes:
 Newton County, MO
 
 General Fixes:
 New notification logic crashes under Android 7.0 or earlier
 
 v2.0.2-1
 New Locations:
 Divide County, ND
 
 Location Fixes:
 Tolland County, CT
 Clayton County, GA
 Delaware County, NY
 Guilford County, NC
 Billings County, ND
 Kidder County, ND
 Lehigh County, PA
